results.content: Easy to understand even my English is not so good. His knowledge about the course is amazing.
results.content_html: Easy to understand even my English is not so good. His knowledge about the course is amazing.

results.content: This is more of an overview than a full course. Nothing about the Digital Ocean API, nothing about databases and so on. I would have liked to see more use case examples: Docker setup, different stack setups (traditionnal, jamstack, ...), etc. In short, more relevant, complete and varied examples. There's a bit of meat missing here. This course alone doesn't allow you to master the tool.
results.content_html: This is more of an overview than a full course. Nothing about the Digital Ocean API, nothing about databases and so on. There's a bit of meat missing here. This course alone doesn't allow you to master the tool.

results.content:
Great course for beginners.

I would be very happy with a more advanced course.

results.content: it was a good match for me

results.content:
Early review: The instructor sounds knowledgeable and confident. So far he's laid out some important concepts in a real nice fashion. I look forward to learn more in this course. 
Late review: He's skipped some very important topics, I for example need to setup a VNC into a DigitalOcean machine which is not shown in the course. I've tried other resources online but I haven't been able to do it.
On a secondary note, some videos are long without a reason where the instructor goes off tangent. Net in net I did learn some useful new things from this course but there was this one big gap that made a major difference.
results.content_html:

Late review: He's skipped some very important topics, I for example need to setup a VNC into a DigitalOcean machine which is not shown in the course. I've tried other resources online but I haven't been able to do it.
On a secondary note, some videos are long without a reason where the instructor goes off tangent. Net in net I did learn some useful new things from this course but there was this one big gap that made a major difference.
